title: My Free Riot Kayle Skin Not Recieved
body:
I was pretty sure Riot announced that they would be giving a free Riot Kayle skin to all those league players, yet I haven't received mine yet. I met all the required elements, like i played all year at least once a day and all my friends go it.
Is there something wrong, I would really appreciate having a free skin, could someone please help me get that skin pls.

replies.body: I checked your account and it looks like you received Riot Kayle pretty early on in the waves that went out. If you're having trouble accessing the skin in champ select, please let me know.
Oh ok, It might be that I got it, its just that I never got like that pop up with the chest saying I got Riot Kayle, I will check today, thank you
